code: import axios from"axios";var baseUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||"http://localhost:3001/api";var api={get:function get(endpoint){return axios.get(baseUrl+endpoint);},create:function create(endpoint,data){return axios.post(baseUrl+endpoint,data);},remove:function remove(endpoint){return axios.delete(baseUrl+endpoint);}};export default api;
